nodes.text: Hethra Mcgrrrr was a Corellian pirate active during the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems. Mcgrrrr led the Black Hole Gang of pirates, who remained active during the time of the Galactic Civil War years after the end of the Clone Wars.

Hethra Mcgrrrr was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Collapse of the Republic, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars Roleplaying products. Hethra Mcgrrrr was first mentioned in the Star Wars Legends in "Spare Parts," a short story authored by Pablo Hidalgo for Star Wars Adventure Journal 11 published by West End Games.
